overview: Sometimes 9 to 5 can be the most erotic part of the day.  Janet craves the touch of the man at the desk across from hers, but as she daydreams about the sensual caress of Mark, he is transferred to a different office. If only Janet knew the mysterious circumstances that brought Mark to her department in the first place; or the secret love affair that her bosses Max and Wendy carry on while nobody is looking; or the heartache that tortures her friend Steve as he works so closely with Melissa.. but never close enough. Will the longing and lust surrounding Janet finally inspire her to act on her desires?
title: An Office Romance
